author: Pomax
content:
#Thimble.webmaker.org, now without mixed content grief

In a previous post I mentioned we were adding a proxy service to thimble, so that you could use http resources on our https service, without everything breaking. As of this moment, that is live on thimble.webmaker.org, so you should no longer be creatively stifled just because you found and used a google image result as a CSS background. 

Now, there are limitataions, as mentioned before, but because you may not want to read a second post, here's the recap:
